LanguageData.AYWhiteWillowBark.label: White willow bark
LanguageData.AYWhiteWillowBark.description: Bark taken from the White willow. As a prepared tincture with alcohol it can ease aches and pains and reduce fevers (specifically malarial). The active extract of the bark, called salicin, after the Latin name Salix is a form of salicylic acid, like aspirin.
